column2: Role & responsibilities     The MIS executive plays a crucial role in leveraging technology to support business operations, facilitate decision-making, and drive organizational growth and efficiency. Maintaining and updating databases, ensuring data integrity, and managing access controls. Analyzing product ( Micro Loan) data to generate insights, creating reports, and presenting findings to management for decision-making. Preferred candidate profile   Graduate with 3+ yrs exp in Product Management Preferably from NBFC. Perks and benefits   Salary
column11: Product Management, Lending, Incentives, Mortgage Loans, Strategic Planning, Product Promotion
